data.eml:eml: A new species of Stilipedidae (Amphipoda: Senticaudata) from the South Mid- Atlantic Ridge

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Serejo, C. S. (2014): A new species of Stilipedidae (Amphipoda: Senticaudata) from the South Mid- Atlantic Ridge. Zootaxa 3852 (1): 133-140, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3852.1.6
